channel.title: Sql on the stupidest thing...
channel.description: Recent content in Sql on the stupidest thing...

item.title: sqlite, feather, and fst
item.description: I don’t think I’m unusual among statisticians in having avoided working directly with databases for much of my career. The data for my projects have been reasonably small. (In fact, basically all of the data for my 20 years of projects are on my laptop’s drive.) Flat files (such as CSV files) were sufficient. But I’ve finally entered the modern era of biggish data. (Why do they call it big data?
